DOC.brief_summary: The Fast-MI registry design evaluate `` real world '' management patient acute myocardial infarction ( MI ) , assess in-hospital , medium long-term outcome
DOC.detailed_description: Primary objective : compare survival follow admission USIC accord term care
DOC.criteria: admission within 48 hour occurence acute myocardial infarction ( AMI ) write informed consent DNA serum databank AMI occur within 48 hour therapeutic intervention ( bypass , coronary angioplasty chirurgical intervention ) diagnostic AMI confirm
